ns0:Concept.displayName: Aspiration pneumonia resulting from a procedure (disorder)

ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains diagnoses most commonly used for patients with Healthcare Associated Pneumonia (HCAP) or nosocomial pneumonia.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have an active diagnosis of Healthcare Associated Pneumonia (HCAP) or nosocomial pneumonia. Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the Diagnosis category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Include codes representing a diagnosis of Healthcare Associated Pneumonia (HCAP) or nosocomial pneumonia using the SNOMED CT and ICD10 code systems.),(Exclusion Criteria: None.)
ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Definition: (2.16.840.1.113762.1.4.1111.131:Health Care Associated Pneumonia),(2.16.840.1.113883.3.666.5.2138:Healthcare associated pneumonia SM CT)
